page.title: 11HEADLESS CROSS AREA REDDITCH
page.content: {Redditch}is a new town, but the area called{Headless Cross}is in the original part of Redditch. This difference between old and new is best shown by the water towers. The new tower is very tall and modern and can be seen for miles, but also in our area is the old water tower built many years ago. There are lots of new homes being built, but there are plenty of spaces. Morton Stanley Park is very large with many walks, most suitable for taking dogs. There is also a play area and a pond. We have two golf courses in our area which adds to the open space. There are a number of shops and a regular bus service into the town centre. {Headless Cross}has all the advantages of being close by the town centre whilst still being a countryside district.
